anita come closer
stop crying and listen to me
i guess its too late now

chorus
anita its over
theres nothing thats left now to say

instrumental

verse 2
anita come closer
and close your pretty blue eyes
your young dreams just cant be
and somehow you must realize
and each time youre with me
my conscience reminds me
of someone whos waiting alone
anita youre dreaming
and when you awake ill be gone
